articles.title: e1: Learning Adaptive Control of Reasoning Effort

articles.description:
arXiv:2510.27042v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Increasing the thinking budget of AI models can significantly improve accuracy, but not all questions warrant the same amount of reasoning. Users may prefer to allocate different amounts of reasoning effort depending on how they value output quality versus latency and cost.
